data.text: Ma e fweny mane Isaya wuod Amoz noneno kuom Juda kod Jerusalem:
E ndalo giko
Ogendini mangʼeny nobi kawacho niya,
Obiro ngʼado bura e kind ogendini
Yaye od Jakobo,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, isejwangʼo jogi,
Pinygi opongʼ gi fedha kod dhahabu;
Pinygi opongʼ kod nyiseche manono;
Omiyo dhano nodwok piny
Donjuru e buche manie kind lwendni, ponduru e buche manie lowo
Wangʼ teko mar ngʼama janjore nothir
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego owalo odiechiengʼ
nimar yiende sida duto maboyo moriere man Lebanon
kaachiel gi gode maboyo duto
gi kuonde moger malo mag jorito,
kod meli mangʼeny duto mag ohala
Wich teko mar dhano ibiro dwoko piny
kendo nyiseche manono notiek pep.
Ji noring kapondo e buche manie kind lwendni
E kindeno ji nojwangʼ
Ji noring kapondo e buche manie kind lwendni
We keto genoni kuom dhano nimar dhano,
